overview_of_class: In the third quarter of Elementary Persian, students will become acquainted with a variety of more complex language structures, including the subjunctive and conditional moods. By the end of the quarter, they will be able to express their own wishes and fears and correctly produce conditional sentences in the context of daily living. They will be able to read and write simple texts related to daily life and on topics with which they are familiar, and will develop skills for reading and extracting the main point from more complicated materials.
name: Persian I
subject: PERSIAN
